If this is an ITS claim, and the HCPCS Procedure code (2400 SV301 2) contains values K0000-K9999, C0000-C9999, T0000-T9999, H0000-H9999, error message "Invalid Code For This Payer - Refile With Appropriate CPT/HCPCS Code" will display.
